rules_text:
Blockbuster 12 [i](As an additional cost to cast this spell, you may tap twelve untapped permanents you control. If you do, this spell is a blockbuster.)[/i]
This spell can't be countered.
Uncapped Rage deals 3 damage to any target. If this spell is a blockbuster, it deals 10 damage to that permanent or player and that damage can't be prevented.
